text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump But aren’t those the jobs that were lost do to COVID-19 returning so in effect there’s no NEW jobs only the old jobs people lost temporarily due to COVID-19 that are now gradually coming back. Keep it real Bobbi Doll press secretary. 👧🤪
